Hey, nice to meet you!

I work at the intersection of people and technology.

I'm now in the Federal Government with a bunch of great folk at 18F an internal consultancy that helps agencies modernize their approach to technnology and digital strategy.

In the past I've worked with IBM, GE, Pepsico, AIG, Argo Insurance, Goldman Sachs, JPMorgan, and Time Warner Cable in various roles relating to:

  • Organization Design
  • Data Science
  • Policy and Strategy Research
  • Automation + Operations
